function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Delay in modeling the impact of school closure","Impact":"Significantly degrades the fits of regression models","Mitigation":"Account for the 7-day lag to avoid degradation of fits in regression models","Technologies":"Statistical modeling and data analysis tools","People":"Researchers, statisticians","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"},{"Description":"Oversimplification of the impact of partially opening schools","Impact":"May lead to inaccurate assessment of the effect of school closure","Mitigation":"Conduct more detailed analysis of the impact of partial school reopening","Technologies":"Statistical modeling and data analysis tools","People":"Researchers, education policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, education authorities"},{"Description":"Identification problem due to curfew timing","Impact":"Difficulty in detecting statistically significant differences in the effects of curfews","Mitigation":"Conduct longer-term analysis and consider regional variations in curfew timings","Technologies":"Statistical modeling and data analysis tools","People":"Researchers, policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"}]}
